title: Petroleum Products (Petroleum Levy) (Amendment) Ordinance, 2025
description: Official consolidated text of Petroleum Products (Petroleum Levy) (Amendment) Ordinance, 2025 (II of 2025) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Ordinance shall be
called the Petroleum Products (Petroleum Levy) (Amendment) Ordinance, 2025.

provisions.title: Section 2. Amendment of Section 7, Ordinance XXV of 1961
provisions.content:
In the
Petroleum Products (Petroleum Levy) Ordinance, 1961 (XXV of 1961),
hereinafter referred to as “the said Ordinance”, in section 7, for the words
“Except for the Fifth Schedule, the” the word “The” shall be substituted.

provisions.title: Section 3. Omission of the Fifth Schedule, Ordinance XXV of 1961
provisions.content:
In
- ASIF ALI ZARDARI,
| President.
’ RAJA NAEEM AKBAR,
Secretary.
. PRINTED BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, ISLAMABAD.
PUBLISHED BY THE DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD. KARACHI.
